text: "Days" is a 1968 song by The Kinks and was released as a non-album single. It did appear on the sixth studio album The Kinks Are the Village Green Preservation Society in New Zealand and Europe. It went to number 12 in the United States, number 11 in New Zealand and Denmark, number 28 in Germany and number 6 in the Netherlands. It was covered by Kirsty MacColl in 1989. == References == Category:1968 songs Category:The Kinks songs Category:Petula Clark songs Category:Kirsty MacColl songs
title: Days (The Kinks song)
